bm_desc: 1. To consider the proposal for appointment of Mr. Bhavin Jayantibhai Kothiya (DIN: 11379649), as an Additional Non-Executive Independent Director; and2. To consider and transit any other business, if any, which may be placed before the Board with the permission of the Chairman.
To consider convening the Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company and to approve the accompanying agenda items and the Notice of the AGM. And other business matters
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025 and dividend
To consider issuance of equity shares of the Company by way of a preferential issue
To consider Fund Raising  by issuance of Non-Convertible Debentures through private placement via Electronic Bidding Platform (EBP).

company: Sri Adhikari Brothers Television Network Limited
bm_desc: To consider other business matters i.e., to consider and approve name change of the Company, alteration in object clause and any other items with the permission of chairperson
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025
To consider Fund Raising and other business matters

To consider and approve the public issue of secured, rated, listed, redeemable non-convertible debentures, in one or more tranches, in compliance with the provisions of the SEBI(Issue and Listing of Non-Convertible Securities) Regulations, 2021

Intimation for the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company which  is scheduled on November 26, 2025, inter alia, to consider and approve the standalone and consolidated unaudited financial results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2025.
To consider interim dividend for the FY 2025-26

SUPREMEINF : 28-Nov-2025 :  The Company has informed the Exchange that a Board meeting to be held on November 24, 2025 has been re-scheduled. Further, the Company has informed the Exchange that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 28, 2025,  To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025
To consider and approve the financial results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025
To consider and approve the financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2025 and other business matters
